mapper.select:
select distinct z.zsid, z.bdcdyh, z.bdcqzh, z.zhlsh, z.nf , z.qzysxlh, z.qlqtzk, z.qxdm, z.szsxqc, z.fzr , z.fzsj, z.lzr, z.lzsj, z.lzrzjh,z.lzrdh,z.lzrzjzl, z.szr , z.szsj, z.zslx, z.fj, z.zl, z.qlr as qlrmc , z.ywr ywrmc, z.gyfs, z.qllx, z.yt, z.mj , z.qlxz, z.syqx,z.zmqlsx,z.ewmnr,z.zhxlh,z.sqsjc , xm.xmid, xm.qszt, xm.gzlslid, xm.ytdzh, xm.ycqzh , qlr.zjh as qlrzjh, xm.slbh, xm.djjg, cq.gyqk , xm.bdclx,xm.djsj,xm.djyy,cq.ghyt,xm.ywrzjh,z.yt as ghytmc from bdc_zs z inner join bdc_xm_zs_gx gx on z.zsid = gx.zsid inner join bdc_xm xm on xm.xmid = gx.xmid inner join bdc_qlr qlr on xm.xmid = qlr.xmid left join bdc_fdcq cq on cq.xmid = xm.xmid where qlr.qlrlb = 1 and z.zslx =#{zslx} and (qlr.zjh = #{qlrzjh} or dlrzjh=#{qlrzjh}) --and xm.slsj > to_date('2019-10-18','yyyy-mm-dd')
AND XM.djxl not in
#{item}
and z.qzysxlh is null and xm.qszt = 1
select count(*) as count from bdc_yzh where qzysxlh =#{yzh} and syqk != 6 and zslx = (select zslx from bdc_zs where zsid = #{zsid})
